section.title: userapps
section.para: Access the list of all applications available to the current user. Applications are filtered based on the user's role and the applications approved for the user's education organization.

entry.para: Returns the requested collection of resource representations.
Request: There is no request body for GET. When forming your GET request URI, use the &RESTAPI; global parameters and URI patterns.
The following additional parameters are available:

listitem.para: is_admin - Filter by administrator applications. When using /api/rest/userapps?is_admin=true as a filter, results include only applications marked as administrator applications. When using /api/rest/userapps?is_admin=false as a filter, results include only applications not specific to administrators.

entry.para: Response: 200 OK - The TotalCount header contains the number of items that were returned. The response body contains the requested resource representations, including HATEOAS links to reachable URIs.
